channel.title: Runefest
channel.description:
the venue is vinopolis and the ticket price has been refunded to everyone who ordered
both fucking strange moves :/

item.title: Runefest
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:36, topic:348397”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=444775.msg3269964#msg3269964 date=1279132557]

Jagex would like to think that they’re the center of the gaming world, but nobody really gives a shit about them.

Oh, I dunno. As the largest indie games developer in the UK, one of the largest employers, and having made its shareholders the 600-something richest men in the UK, I’d say it’s done pretty well…

People are ashamed of RuneScape and playing the game, so they don’t support it in the gaming community that much. Unlike Xbox games…
[/quote]

I don’t know of anyone who is ‘ashamed’ of playing runescape, I do know people who SHOULD be ashamed of playing Xbox all the time.[/quote]

i bet 0 out of 10 people would feel pride in walking down the streets with a RS t-shirt on, I’m pretty sure they would feel embarrassed/ashamed.
but i see many people with Xbox related t-shirts on all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Runefest
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:37, topic:348397”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=444775.msg3270045#msg3270045 date=1279137111]

Jagex would like to think that they’re the center of the gaming world, but nobody really gives a shit about them.

Oh, I dunno. As the largest indie games developer in the UK, one of the largest employers, and having made its shareholders the 600-something richest men in the UK, I’d say it’s done pretty well…

People are ashamed of RuneScape and playing the game, so they don’t support it in the gaming community that much. Unlike Xbox games…

I don’t know of anyone who is ‘ashamed’ of playing runescape, I do know people who SHOULD be ashamed of playing Xbox all the time.
[/quote]
You’d get punched in the face if you said the R word where I live =/[/quote]
and I’d bet the faggot’s who’d ‘punch’ someone if they said “RUNESCAPE” play there PS3/XBOX360 wayyyyyy more… finish sentence

Read full topic

item.title: Runefest
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:32, topic:348397”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=444775.msg3269371#msg3269371 date=1279084542]

wasnt there something about people attending being able to create their own content using their tools?

Was there? I’d like a link to that.
[/quote]
There definitely was, I recall discussing it with Mopman. Not sure if it’s still around since they went media blackout on the website.[/quote]
They’re so ridiculous with all of their secrecy rofl.
Jagex would like to think that they’re the center of the gaming world, but nobody really gives a shit about them. I suppose that’s the safest mindset to have though; if you don’t believe that you’ll someday become a god then you’ll surely become a worm.

Read full topic
